edu.umd.hooka.alignment.hmm

Class HMM

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.hooka.alignment.AlignmentModel
      • edu.umd.hooka.alignment.model1.Model1Base
        • edu.umd.hooka.alignment.model1.Model1
          • edu.umd.hooka.alignment.hmm.HMM
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HMM_NullWord

    public class HMM
extends Model1
    Represents an HMM that applies to a single sentence pair, which is derived from the parameters stored in a TTable and an ATable object.
    Author:
    redpony
